mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reserve (ReserveID, CustomerID, ShowID) VALUES (#{reserveId}, #{customerId}, #{showId})
mapper.select: SELECT ReserveID, CustomerID, ShowID From tbl_reserve

select count (*) as count, r.ReserveID, c.username, t.theaterName, sc.ScreenNm ,m.movieNm, sh.showTime, se.SeatNum FROM tbl_reserve AS r INNER JOIN tbl_customer AS c on r.CustomerID = c.CustomerID INNER JOIN tbl_show AS sh on r.showID = sh.ShowID INNER JOIN tbl_screen As sc on sh.ScreenID = sc.ScreenID INNER JOIN tbl_theater AS t on sc.TheaterID = t.TheaterID INNER JOIN tbl_movie As m on sh.MovieCd = m.movieCd INNER JOIN tbl_showSeat AS ss on r.ReserveID = ss.ReserveID INNER JOIN tbl_seat As se on ss.SeatID = se.SeatID
